alert.note: Alert for Christian; Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar; Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:30AM CDT until May 07 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Coles County in east central Illinois... Southern Christian County in central Illinois... Southern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Southeastern Moultrie County in central Illinois... Clark County in east central Illinois... Shelby County in central Illinois... Cumberland County in east central Illinois... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 530 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dennison to near Morrisonville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Morrisonville around 535 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include West Union. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 169 and 191. Interstate 70 between mile markers 106 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Clark; Coles; Cumberland; Edgar; Moultrie; Shelby
